methods.Synopsis: Returns all flight stages for a flight

parameters.Description: The id of the flight the flight stages belong to

parameters.Name: type
parameters.Description: The type of the flight stage, one of ['pool','single_elim','double_elim','round_robin']

parameters.Name: position
parameters.Description: The position of the flight stage in the flight

parameters.Name: seeding_method
parameters.Description: The method to use when seeding the flight stage, one of [TBD]

parameters.Name: advance
parameters.Description: The number of teams that should advance from this pool [Pool Play]

parameters.Name: teams_per_pool
parameters.Description: The number of teams per pool [Pool Play]

parameters.Name: games_per_team
parameters.Description: The number of games per team [Pool Play]

parameters.Name: third_place
parameters.Description: Whether a third place game should be played [Single Elimination]

parameters.Name: consolation
parameters.Description: Whether a consolation bracket should be played [Single Elimination]

methods.Synopsis: Lists teams that are entered in the tournament, with their current flight, if any
Adds a team to the tournament, to be added to a flight later
Removes a team from the tournament, if it has not yet been added to a flight. Will not remove a team that has already been added to a flight. Use flights#remove_team.
